wp25EasterEggs-desc: This is an extension to celebrate Wikipedia's 25th birthday by adding interactive Easter Eggs.
wp25eastereggs-enable-description: Celebrate 25 years of Wikipedia with a [https://wikimediafoundation.org/wikipedia25/wikipedia-mascot/ cute reading companion]
wp25eastereggs-enable-help: Celebrate 25 years of Wikipedia with a cute reading companion
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-de: Birthday mode is a limited-time, opt-in feature designed to celebrate Wikipedia's 25th anniversary by creating a festive atmosphere when activated.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ad: When toggled on, it introduces "Baby Globe", a birthday mascot, that acts as a reading companion and unlocks hidden animations and visual "easter egg" surprises for users to discover. If the extension is not turned on, the appearance setting will not be visible to readers. Learn more on the [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_25/Easter_egg_experiments MetaWiki page]. This special campaign feature will be live for a month from 16 February 2026. On 16 March 2026, we will remove the feature from all wikis.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-en:
Enabling Birthday mode will allow readers to turn on and off an appearance setting titled 'Birthday mode'. When readers enable 'Birthday mode', Neutral Baby Globe appears on pages according to the Global filter.

Other more interesting and playful versions of Baby Globe are configured in the Baby Globe special animation filters.

See all the versions of Baby Globe and what to expect from the animations [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_25/Easter_egg_experiments/article_configuration here].
Controls where Baby Globe should be displayed, does not control the Birthday mode appearance switch.
Enable Baby Globe to appear everywhere
Enable Baby Globe to appear only on selected pages
Disable Baby Globe only on selected pages (effectively enable everywhere except the selected pages)
Depending on Filter type, this field is either ignored, acts as an allow list, or acts as a block list
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-mo: Configure which Baby Globe animations appear on which pages. See the [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_25/Easter_egg_experiments/article_configuration MetaWiki page] for full library of animations.
communityconfiguration-wp25eastereggs-ph: On page load, Baby Globe scrolls on a phone with a neutral expression.
Enable on predefined set of pages
Enable/disable this state of the BabyGlobe on a predefined set of pages
Adds more pages to the predefined set of pages if those are enabled. Allows only on selected pages if predefined set of pages are disabled.
Removes pages from the combination of predefined set of pages combined with extra allow.

extension-wp25eastereggs-minerva-launch-: Celebrate Wikipediaâ€™s 25th birthday with a new reading companion: Baby Globe! Together you can unlock hidden surprises across Wikipedia.
